intro: Bonnetia dinizii, commonly known as the Dinizii's bonnetia, is a flowering plant native to the Hawaiian Islands. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its delicate, fragrant flowers that are typically white or pale yellow. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, often found in native forests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
